channel.title: Development on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Scrrrenshots
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Sometimes screenshots need t' be redone. This plank explains how t' create th' different screenshots, tools an' sett'ns Common Creat'n: Use English translat'n Empty search Remove history checkmarks but leave it on th' plank thats used fer th' screenshot Aft resize o' th' plank into th' required resolut'n, reload th' plank t' have all scrollbars 'n default load'n posit'n Demo Screenshot Rrrambl'n:
